body.name: XUEGW Ergonomic Office Chair Comfort Home Desk Chair Adjustable High Back Mesh Chair Lumbar Support Computer Chair,Black
features: [Ergonomic Support]：The ergonomically designed backrest of our ergonomic office chair has prominent lumbar support to fit the natural curvature of the spine.High density double layer mesh back, flexible supportive, breathable. Thick padded seat cushion provides all day comfort.

[Freely adjustable desk chairs] Lifting the headrest on the XUEGW office chair enables it to rest precisely where your head is. To raise or lower the seat, search for a pneumatic adjustment lever. Your spinal discs might be released of pressure by reclining and rocking.

[Space-saving]：Reversible armrest design and won't be in your way when not in use. The Armrests of the computer chair provide comfortable support for your arms and can be flipped up to save space effectively while not in use.

[Smooth Movement & Stability]：Our comfy office desk chair comes with smooth and multi-direction casters, which allow you to move the chair around effortlessly. They can run smoothly on tile, wooden floors, carpets, and other floorings. The large 5-star base increases stability even at the full height range. The maximum weight capacity is 250 lbs.
[Easy Assembly ]- The Home Office Chair comes with installation instructions and all necessary hardware and tools. We also provide instructions to help you install your office chair in 10-15 minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble office chair comfortable with seat pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Chair for Big & Tall People. Don't install headreast.
reviews.reviewText: This chair is a great buy! Super easy to put together. Stunning to look at. And super sturdy for those of us who are not delicate little flowers. I started out at 330lbs and am now 274lbs, and the chair has held up extremely well. Wheels roll smoothly without any warp. The cushion is comfortable, and the back is supported. I would not install the headrest, though, because it is a bit on the flimsy side (unlike everything else about this chair) and, outside of looks, serves no real function. But your choice here. The fabric, despite the light color, is super easy to keep clean with warm water and a sponge if need be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This office chair is a great upgrade from my previous chair. It is comfortable to use, and was easy to assemble. Everything seems to be well made from good quality materials. The support that it provides is much better than I had expected, especially for my lower back. The adjustable height and headrest works as it should. Overall, this is a great chair and I'm happy to have gotten it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Too much lumbar, uncomfortable for me personally
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice chair that was fairly easy to put together. The instructions were simple and the parts were easily labeled. The only issue I have with this chair is the lumbar support section. It protrudes out too far and I cannot move or adjust it. It pushes forward so far that I don't ever feel like I'm fully in the seat. I keep wanting to sit back in the chair but is no room for that. Lumbar support is great but some people want a milder lumbar section and I'm one of those. It's okay for short-time sitting but if I had to sit in that chair a full 8 hours I would be in pain since it is so uncomfortable for me. I gave this 4 stars because there is physically nothing wrong with the chair, it arrived as described and looks really nice with great material but it just feels too small for me since I can't sit "back" in the chair due to the size of the lumbar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Comfort and Support for Prolonged Office Hours
reviews.reviewText: As a professional who spends significant hours at the desk, investing in a high-quality office chair is paramount for both productivity and well-beingDesign and Build:A beautiful combo of White and Grey that gives a modernized look with a lower back lumbar.Comfort:The cushion is nice and firm and the lumbar pushes out perfectly to be flush against my lower back ensuring a comfortable sitting experience throughout the day.Easy Assembly:Setting up the chair was a breeze that only took 30 minutes with one person. Did not actually test with two people to see how much faster it would of been.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: I do like the look of this chair. It wasn’t hard to put together, it took hubby 15 minutes to put together. It is a little narrow, so it is not good for the big and tall. Hubby needs to pull up the arms to sit in it, and he isn’t a fan of the lower lumbar support. I do like the headrest, and it’s and that the back is adjustable to lean back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: This was easy to put together. The chair glides on carpet well and is very comfortable. My daughter said it is an amazing gaming chair and really made sitting a her desk much more enjoyable! The color is as pictured as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: This assembly of this chair was a piece of cake, thanks to the great (but simple) instructions and well-packaged parts. I can't remember putting together another chair this quickly! It's also very sturdy and all of the pieces, while plastic, are high quality and made to last. The only things I didn't like are 1) the lumbar support is not height-adjustable (I removed it because it wasn't comfortable), and 2) the seat cushioning is thin (I added a chair cushion). Even with these two demerits, I wouldn't hesitate to buy this chair again. Recommended.
